abstract: NBC announced on Tuesday that it had extended the show’s finale another 15 minutes, meaning the episode set for May 16 will run from 9 to 10:15 p.m.
snippet: NBC announced on Tuesday that it had extended the show’s finale another 15 minutes, meaning the episode set for May 16 will run from 9 to 10:15 p.m.
lead_paragraph: NBC is having a hard time saying goodbye to its most successful comedy of the last decade, “The Office.” Its one-hour finale just got longer.

headline.main: ‘The Office’ Gets an Extra 15 Minutes to Say Goodbye
headline.print_headline: Upsizing the Finale Of ‘The Office’ on NBC
